## EthersLiquity.getAirdropHasClaimed() method

Get the status of airdrop claim.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getAirdropHasClaimed(address?: string, overrides?: EthersCallOverrides): Promise<boolean>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  address | string | Address whose status should be retrieved. |
